channel.title: CVE Feed for Mattermost -- Mattermost Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mattermost -- Mattermost Mobile

item.title: CVE-2024-24975|2024-06-04T17:43:22.998Z -- mattermost -- mattermost%20mobile
item.description: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption in Mattermost Mobile versions before 2.13.0 fails to limit the size of the code block that will be processed by the syntax highlighter, allowing an attacker to send a very large code block and crash the mobile app.
